artefact.overview: Suggest a Community Payback project that would benefit your area - eg removing graffiti and litter, clearing wasteland or decorating a public place or building
artefact.more_information:
To suggest a project, you'll need to give:

- your contact details
- a specific location of the where the work could be carried out
- a description of what needs to be done

Once the form is completed, your local Probation Trust will contact you to let you know if your suggestion has been accepted.
artefact.introduction: You can suggest a Community Payback project that would benefit your area - for example, removing graffiti and litter, clearing wasteland or decorating a public building.

details.description: Including criminal injuries compensation and reporting suspected crimes
Legal processes, courts and the police
